description: Rowan is quickly becoming one of the most fun models we have had in a while, so I knew pairing him with Porter would be a good time for all. “You know I just really like coming here and fucking guys!” Rowan recently admitted that he might not be 100% straight. “You do?” I asked. “How could you not? I fly out, have great sex, cum and laugh a ton!” These two hit if off pretty quickly and goofed off in between takes and sometimes even during takes. “What can I say, he brings out the trouble maker in me!” Porter giggled a bit. Porter took Rowan like a champ in a bunch of different positions and had a smile on his face the whole time.
title: Rowan & Porter: Bareback
